## spacer() function

Create empty vertical space.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function spacer(height?: number): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

height


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Number of blank lines to insert (default: 1)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

A string containing the specified number of newlines

## Remarks

Useful for adding vertical spacing between sections of your UI.

## Example


```typescript
vstack(
  text('Header'),
  spacer(2),
  text('Content')
)
```
